about_the_game:
Cloud Cats' Land - A classic adventure with a modern twist!

Have you ever tried to escape from the island where the Cloud Cats live?

Do you think cats are cute and fluffy?

But is it really so?

Maybe the cats aren't what they seem?

The secrets of the Cloud Cats' Land are waiting for you!

STORY

Miraculously surviving a shipwreck, the main character finds himselves on the shore of a mysterious island. In the distance, a mysterious lighthouse looms, and perhaps help awaits the hero there? 

But before they uncover the truth, they must embark on a long journey, solving puzzles and involving the Cloud Cats—enigmatic inhabitants of this island.

PUZZLES AND RIDDLES

The world of Cloud Cats' Land is full of mysteries and unique challenges in every corner. Solve puzzles with the help of magical cats, complete mini-games, and explore the island to find the key to your escape.

  • How can you convince the guards to let you into the forbidden zone?

  • How do you lull the vigilance of a wise sensei?

  • How do you steal a hat from a troll’s head?

  • What do Cloud Cats love?

  • What secret does the island of Cloud Cats hide?

  • Does the sea serpent have an allergy to fur?

  • And what happened to the lighthouse keeper?

GAME FEATURES

  • A classic quest adventure.

  • A puzzle-filled adventure populated by incredible Cloud Cats and other magical creatures that help solve puzzles.

  • Suitable for players of all ages.

  • Over 50 unique and diverse locations.

  • A pleasant mix of 2D and 3D graphics.

  • Catch and use Cloud Cats with unique abilities, build aerial bridges, and uncover the secrets of ancient idols.

name: Cloud Cats` Land

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7100 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Adventure on the mysterious Island of Cloud Cats! 😺😻😸 Explore picturesque locations, ⛺️ meet magical creatures 🐲, and solve unusual puzzles. 🧩 Uncover the island's secrets and find your way to freedom! 🐾
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
